template.name: TaskExecution0

query.formula: strategy opt = maxE((tasks_finished()*REWARDRATE) - globalTime)[<=MaxLearnTime]{ movement0.location, taskExe0.location, movement1.location, taskExe1.location, movement2.location, taskExe2.location, iteration[0], iteration[1], iteration[2], tf[0][0], tf[0][1], tf[0][2], tf[0][3], tf[1][0], tf[1][1], tf[1][2], tf[1][3], tf[2][0], tf[2][1], tf[2][2], tf[2][3]}->{}:<> (((forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i]>=MaxIteration)) || globalTime >= MaxLearnTime)
E[<=MaxLearnTime;2000] (max: globalTime*((exists(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i] < MaxIteration))) under opt
query.comment:
A[] ((taskExe0.T1 imply movement0.P1) and (taskExe1.T1 imply movement1.P1) and (taskExe2.T1 imply movement2.P1) and (taskExe0.T2 imply movement0.P2) and (taskExe1.T2 imply movement1.P2) and (taskExe2.T2 imply movement2.P2) and (taskExe0.T3 imply movement0.P3) and (taskExe1.T3 imply movement1.P3) and (taskExe2.T3 imply movement2.P3)) opt
E<> ((forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i]>=MaxIteration)) under opt
saveStrategy("/home/ron/uppaal/projects/q_learning/output/complete_path.out", opt)

query.formula: Pr[<=MaxLearnTime] (<> forall(i:int[0,AgentNum-1]) iteration[i] >= MaxIteration ) under opt
